pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, June 10, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Prime Minister of North Macedonia, Oliver Spasovski.

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver a commencement speech in English to the Class of 2020 alongside several graduates of post-secondary institutions.

Carleton University
1125 Colonel By Drive

Notes for media:

  • Pooled coverage

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver a commencement speech in French to the Class of 2020 alongside several graduates of post-secondary institutions.

Carleton University
1125 Colonel By Drive

Notes for media:

  • Pooled coverage

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the sitting of the Special Committee on the COVID-19 Pandemic.
